titleStmt.title: Schelomonocham, or King Solomon his solace Containing (among many thinges of right worthy request) King Solomon his politie, his true repentance, and finally his salvation, first presented to the Kinges most excellent Maiestie, and afterward published.
titleStmt.author: Carpenter, John, d. 1621.

notesStmt.note: Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: [par.]⁴ A-Z 2A⁴ 2*.
Reproduction of the original in Yale University. Library.
